classData.comment:
/**
 * @summary Main Thread Addon to render Mermaid diagrams.
 *
 * This addon is responsible for loading the Mermaid library and rendering diagrams into the DOM.
 * Since Mermaid requires direct DOM access, it must run on the Main Thread.
 *
 * It is primarily consumed by:
 * 1. `Neo.component.Markdown`: For rendering ```mermaid``` code blocks embedded in Markdown content.
 * 2. `Neo.component.wrapper.Mermaid`: A standalone component wrapper for displaying Mermaid diagrams.
 *
 * @class Neo.main.addon.Mermaid
 * @extends Neo.main.addon.Base
 */
classData.summary:
Main Thread Addon to render Mermaid diagrams.

This addon is responsible for loading the Mermaid library and rendering diagrams into the DOM.
Since Mermaid requires direct DOM access, it must run on the Main Thread.

It is primarily consumed by:
1. `Neo.component.Markdown`: For rendering ```mermaid``` code blocks embedded in Markdown content.
2. `Neo.component.wrapper.Mermaid`: A standalone component wrapper for displaying Mermaid diagrams.
classData.name: Mermaid

classData.comment:
/**
         * List methods which must get cached until the addon reaches its `isReady` state
         * @member {String[]} interceptRemotes
         */
classData.description: List methods which must get cached until the addon reaches its isReady state
classData.name: interceptRemotes

classData.comment:
/**
         * Remote method access for other workers
         * @member {Object} remote
         * @protected
         */
classData.name: remote

classData.description: Loads the Mermaid library if it is not already present. Initializes the library with startOnLoad: false to allow manual control over rendering.
classData.name: loadFiles

classData.comment:
/**
     * Renders a Mermaid diagram into a specific DOM element.
     * @param {Object} data
     * @param {String} [data.code] The mermaid diagram syntax/code. If provided, it will replace the element's text content.
     * @param {String} data.id The DOM ID of the container element.
     */
classData.description: Renders a Mermaid diagram into a specific DOM element.

params.description: The mermaid diagram syntax/code. If provided, it will replace the element's text content.
params.name: data.code

params.description: The DOM ID of the container element.
params.name: data.id

classData.name: render
